price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: ”Sε Ahummͻborͻ Hene no wͻ ba a, εneε me ne asomfoͻ no nea odi kan”.
arabic: قُلۡ إِن كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَلَدٞ فَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡعَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul in kāna lilrraḥmāni waladun fa-anā awwalu al-ʿābidīna
